ifeq ($(MTK_CROSSMOUNT_SUPPORT), yes)

LOCAL_PATH:= $(call my-dir)

include $(CLEAR_VARS)

LOCAL_MODULE := libdebugger_agent
LOCAL_PROPRIETARY_MODULE := true
LOCAL_MODULE_OWNER := mtk

LOCAL_CFLAGS := -DDEBUG

LOCAL_SRC_FILES := \
    src/agent.cc

LOCAL_C_INCLUDES := \
    $(LOCAL_PATH)/include/. \
    $(LOCAL_PATH)/src/. \
    $(LOCAL_PATH)/../v8/include/. \
    $(LOCAL_PATH)/../uv/include/. \
    $(LOCAL_PATH)/../cares/include/. \
    $(LOCAL_PATH)/../../src/. 


LOCAL_CPP_EXTENSION := .cc

include $(MTK_STATIC_LIBRARY)

endif
